Title: Cheer Up, Yi-Mo
Description:
Ever since this storm began, I've just been... tired.

Not physically... no. It's like my very soul is exhausted. Worthless. Hopeless. I imagine it's what one feels when a mate leaves them for someone with a rounder belly, but I've never had a mate so how would I know?

How can I claim to know anything? I'm worthless to everyone but these thunderbirds. At least they'll have a good meal out of me.

<Yi-Mo sighs deeply and continues staring off into the sky. It doesn't look like he's going anywhere.>
ObjectivesText: Bring Yi-Mo Longbrow back to Zhu's Watch.
RewardText:
I can't believe he was actually going to do that... This despair is worse than I had even imagined.

I cannot thank you enough for bringing him back.
